channel.title: Mike Kistler's blog
channel.description: Recent content on Mike Kistler's blog

item.title: About me
item.description: I am a Principal Product Manager at Microsoft working on the .NET Platform team. I previously worked in the Azure SDK team and before that at IBM building tools to produce SDKs, API documentation, CLIs, and more. I am passionate about HTTP APIs and developer experience and building tools to make developers more productive. I also love learning new things and sharing what I learn with others. All opinions are my own.
